{{Infobox video|type=Machinima trailer|director=[[Dennis Vareide]]|date=December 6, 2011|length=1:00|music=Olive Musique|image=OMT Day.png}}

The '''Official Minecraft Trailer''' is a trailer, created by the YouTuber Vareide to promote the release of ''[[Java Edition]]''.<ref>{{YouTube link|qpc7kN4gBEo|First Minecraft Trailer Mystery â€“ Solved!! (ft Dennis Vareide)|Minecraft|January 28, 2022}}</ref>

== Background and creation ==
Prior to creating the official trailer, Vareide had become known in the community for making fan made promotions with a similar style.<ref>{{YouTube link|FaMTedT6P0I|Minecraft Fan-Made Trailer|This channel is not active|September 19, 2010}}</ref><ref>{{YouTube link|4KBFreaQnUQ|Minecraft Fanmade Teaser|This channel is not active|October 5, 2010}}</ref><ref>{{YouTube link|v5fS4RF3ht0|Minecraft Fanmade Trailer v2|This channel is not active|November 18, 2010}}</ref><ref>{{YouTube link|m_yqOoUMHPg|This Is Minecraft|This channel is not active|December 3, 2010}}</ref> One of these trailers was used on an early version of the website for [[LEGO Minecraft|''LEGO Minecraft'']].<ref>{{Citation|url=http://www.lego.com/en-us/minecraft?icmp=COUSFR38Minecraft|title=LEGO.com Minecraft Home|website=LEGO.com|archive-url=https://web.archive.org/web/20140706004032/http://www.lego.com/en-us/minecraft?icmp=COUSFR38Minecraft}}</ref> The song used in the trailer, Only Human, is a royalty free track composed by Serge Essiambre, also known as Olive Musique.<ref>{{Citation|url=https://www.premiumbeat.com/royalty-free-tracks/only-human|title=Only Human|author=Olive Musique|website=PremiumBeat}}</ref>

== Summary ==
The trailer begins on a shot of a [[taiga]], as the [[sun]] rises and the narrator says "let's go to a place, where everything is made of blocks." [[Steve]] appears on a [[beach]], and then wanders through [[plains]] into another taiga, before climbing a [[Windswept Hills|mountain]] and appearing in a [[cave]]. In a cold [[Biome|region]], Steve begins placing planks, slowly building a house with a [[cobblestone]] ceiling and [[glass]] windows, planting a farm as it [[Rain|rains]].

Now appearing in a [[desert]], Steve stands high on a [[Sand|dune]], as the narrator promises "the most significant sandbox you'll ever set foot in." Steve then appears on a castle made of [[Smooth Stone Slab|smooth stone slabs]] and [[netherrack]], before using a [[piston]] to push cobblestone, and riding a [[minecart]]. In a [[forest]], Steve and a [[Player|friend]] are collecting and placing resources respectively. Indoors, Steve crafts an [[Iron Chestplate|iron chestplate]], and rushes out into the [[night]] with a full [[Armor|set]] to fight a [[zombie]]. In the same biome, Steve finds a cave, and spots a [[creeper]] inside. Steve then appears in a forest in daytime, and runs off, concluding the trailer.

== Legacy ==
As of 2026, this is the most popular video on the Minecraft YouTube channel.<ref>{{citation|url=https://www.youtube.com/@minecraft/videos|title=Minecraft - YouTube|author=Mojang|website=YouTube}}</ref>
